siteproperty.name: Supplier Directory Vanity URL Prefix
siteproperty.caption: Vanity URL Prefix
siteproperty.Description: The Supplier Directory automatically creates vanity URLs (link alias) entries for each diredtory listing using the organization name. If you want those URLs prefixed, enter the prefix here. For instance, if you want the URL for ACME to read /Directory/ACME, enter the prefix /Directory/ here.
